text:
Target Understandings

Electricity has to flow in a circuit to work.

  • The flow of electricity is called electrical current
  • When electricity is slowed or kept apart, it creates an electrical voltage 
  •  One can control the flow of electricity
  • One way to do this is by controlling resistance. Resistors can be used to reduce the flow of electricity in circuits

Do Now

Drag and drop this tile into your workspace and answer the following question:

Think of the light switches in your house.  Do you have any guesses or knowledge about how they work?
